name: Studio Jo and Co
description:
We are a brand and design agency who opened our studio in Liverpool in January 2014 with a team that have been defining, designing and delivering award winning creative solutions for the past two decades. With clients in locations from York to New York, Exeter to Edinburgh, Leeds to London, Zurich and beyond, we combine creativity and commercial understanding to produce work which displays clear conceptual thought, direction and delivery.
Our aim is simple – to use our experience and creative intelligence to help the businesses we work with achieve their objectives.
